pageContext.claim: “One of the reasons that we have it so bad is the Internet. That's why it's picked up tremendously over the last five years, because of the Internet.”
pageContext.analysis: The Internet can be blamed for many things but there is no evidence that human trafficking has increased because of the Internet. Sex workers have been able to advertise via the Internet, reducing street-level work, but that's not the same thing as human trafficking. The sex-work website Backpage was charged with facilitating underage prostitution, but law enforcement agencies had also used it to track girls who had gone missing.
